string-array.name: changelog_items
string-array.item: fixed private mode not working after a reboot
change background of brightness slider and more!
f2fs/ext4 can be chosen in aroma
magisk support with xposed 86.4 and phhs root
enabled flashlight even on low battery
in rom control check when low battery warning should be set
network preferences now have more color options
ram usage in recent (rom control toggle)
press back to kill app (rom control toggle)
